summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on an urban road. A motorcyclist is visible ahead, moving from the left side of the road towards the center. The motorcyclist maintains a steady speed and direction throughout the frames.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed and direction, following the motorcyclist ahead. The vehicle is keeping a safe distance from the motorcyclist, ensuring no sudden movements or changes in speed.
key_objects: 1) Front: A motorcyclist, approximately 20 meters away, moving steadily towards the center of the road.

characters: Driver of a white sedan, cyclist, scooter rider

actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while observing the movements of the cyclist and the scooter rider. The vehicle is likely preparing to decelerate due to the potential unpredictable movements of the cyclist.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A cyclist, approximately 5 meters away, moving towards the left side of the road, potentially causing the vehicle to decelerate. 2) Right side: A scooter rider, stationary, approximately 3 meters away, posing no immediate threat. 3) Front: A white sedan, approximately 20 meters away, moving slowly, potentially causing the vehicle to maintain a consistent speed.

characters: Driver of a red sedan, security guard, pedestrian
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a road adjacent to a building. A pedestrian is walking on the left side of the road. Suddenly, a collision occurs involving a red sedan and a person on a motorcycle. The motorcycle rider falls onto the road, and the red sedan stops abruptly.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while driving on the road. The red sedan ahead suddenly collides with a motorcycle, causing the sedan to stop abruptly. The self-driving vehicle needs to decelerate to avoid any potential collision with the stopped sedan.
key_objects: 1) Front: A red sedan, approximately 10 meters away, has stopped abruptly due to a collision with a motorcycle. 2) Front: A motorcycle rider, approximately 12 meters away, has fallen onto the road due to the collision.

actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed and direction, as there are no immediate obstacles or changes in the road conditions. The vehicle is likely monitoring the security guards movement to ensure safety.
